idea: To carry on business as Venture Capitalists, Investment advisors, Financial Planner, Financial advisor, Financial Intermediator, Business Consultants, Incubators, Strategic Investors, Marketing Consultants, Advertising solution provider for Start-ups and industrial units, e-commerce activities, MSMEs, Small Scale Industries, Ancillary Industries and providing business solution for empowering small and medium entrepreneurs and operating, establishing, providing and managing e-commerce and m-commerce websites, direct to home and mail order services for all categories of products in all its forms and perspectives and to undertake all such activities to channelize the marketing activities of products manufactured by small and medium enterprises and to run, operate and manage stores, markets, malls, shopping outlets, cash and carry operations, or any format.

idea: Anirudha Advertising & Marketing is a data-driven digital advertising company with roots in the programmatic advertising arena. idea:

idea:
We are a passionate all women team with varied academic backgrounds from the fields of management, accountancy, engineering and commerce. The challenges faced by our own children from the education sector led us to think of a solution. ChangeMatrix is a culmination of this journey and also an effort to make the process of learning far more affordable, enjoyable and stress free. ChangeMatrix is a movement to harness the knowledge of a new emerging set of teachers. Their teaching extends beyond the tradioditional classroom, beyond academics and

across different time zones. We believe we can make a difference in the education and skilling sectors both for our mentors and our students. Our mission is to always provide the right guidance to our learners.
name: CHANGEMATRIX EDUCARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Fanory is an innovative media and entertainment technology company, headquartered in the US. The firm partners with creators and influencers to build exclusive digital platforms that improve engagement and monetization opportunities for the them. Using a suite of proprietary tools and processes, the company provides consumer profile intelligence and AI based analytics, helping them widen their reach globally. Using the latest technology solutions and completely customisable feature sets, Fanory accelerates digital fanbase adoption and engagement at scale, thus helping creators and influencers in becoming stars by helping them in monetisation, recognition and building engagements for them.
name: FANORY TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: I am a mechanical engineering student . Currently in the 3rd year of my Curriculum of engineering . Currently i am working on my startup idea getting info how should i start and how i can execute it.

idea: We aim to help companies, specially new startups or early stage companies, to scale their businesses by assisting them to manage their in-house activities such as recruitment and staffing, outsourcing activities, expense management, Project management, invoice management, reconciliations and much more by providing them space of sharing manpower (work outsource with us) and by providing them online portal for process flow work i.e. Expense Management, Reconciliation, Agreement Management etc. without any heavy one time or setup cost.
name: OPT4SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Trishiv Entertainment is a film & video production house in India; we can act as local production fixers in any Indian city to production companies, film directors, ad agencies, documentary & corporate filmmakers looking for one-stop production management services all over India.
